items.name: Al-Mizan Cultural Hub
items.short_description: A vibrant new nexus for arts, music, and local traditions, offering workshops and performances that bridge ancient heritage with contemporary expression in a modern setting.

items.name: Oasis Green Park
items.short_description: Nouakchott's newest urban green space, offering serene landscapes, walking paths, and shaded areas perfect for family picnics and relaxation amidst the city's bustle.
items.address: Avenue Gamal Abdel Nasser, Ksar, Nouakchott

items.name: Mauritania Grand Mall
items.short_description: A premier shopping destination featuring international brands, local boutiques, a multi-screen cinema, and diverse dining options, bringing a modern retail experience to Nouakchott.

items.name: Ksar Modern Art Space
items.short_description: Showcasing emerging Mauritanian artists and contemporary African art, this newly opened gallery is a dynamic platform for visual expression and cultural dialogue.
items.address: Rue de l'Ambassade de France, Ksar, Nouakchott

items.name: Sahara Tech Hub
items.short_description: A bustling innovation center and co-working space that hosts tech workshops, startup incubators, and networking events, fostering Nouakchott's growing digital economy.
items.address: Boulevard Général de Gaulle, Tevragh Zeina, Nouakchott

items.name: The Nomad's Table
items.short_description: Experience contemporary Mauritanian cuisine with a fusion twist in a stylish, desert-inspired setting. A must-visit for foodies seeking unique flavors and ambiance.

items.name: Atlantic Breeze Promenade
items.short_description: A newly developed waterfront area perfect for evening strolls, offering panoramic views of the Atlantic Ocean, street food vendors, and family-friendly activities.

items.name: Sahara Kids Discovery Lab
items.short_description: An interactive learning space where children can explore science, technology, and Mauritanian culture through hands-on exhibits and engaging workshops, opened recently.

items.name: Zenith Sky Lounge
items.short_description: Perched atop Nouakchott's newest boutique hotel, this stylish rooftop bar offers sophisticated cocktails, light bites, and breathtaking city views, perfect for an evening out.
items.address: Avenue de la Paludisme, Tevragh Zeina, Nouakchott

items.name: Momentum Fitness & Aquatic Center
items.short_description: A state-of-the-art facility featuring a modern gym, Olympic-size swimming pool, and various fitness classes, catering to health enthusiasts and sports lovers seeking a premium experience.
items.address: Rue Moktar Ould Daddah, Lexar, Nouakchott
